parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds weapon item, including magazine, directly to the [[primaryWeapon]]. This is used for infantry weapons.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addPrimaryWeaponItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] or [[Boolean]] - '''false''' is returned if '''item''' can not be added

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>player [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]] "muzzle_snds_H";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addWeaponItem]], [[removePrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removeAllPrimaryWeaponItems]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[addHandgunItem]], [[addBinocularItem]], [[weaponsItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[binocularItems]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 22, 2014 - 23:08 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:SilentSpike|SilentSpike]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If the item being added is not supported by the unit's weapon then the command will simply fail silently. The item is also '''not''' added to the unit's inventory in such a case.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
